stories.title: Expand Accordion Section
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand an accordion section so that I can view the detailed content associated with it.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the accordion is collapsed, When I click on the text 'What is Lorem Ipsum?', Then the content section with the paragraph starting 'It is a long established fact...' should be visible.

stories.title: Collapse Accordion Section
stories.description: As a user, I want to collapse an expanded accordion section so that I can hide the detailed content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given an accordion section is expanded, When I click on the text 'What is Lorem Ipsum?' again, Then the content section should collapse and not be visible.

stories.title: Visibility of Accordion Questions
stories.description: As a user, I want all accordion question headings to be visible so that I can choose which content I want to view.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the interface, Then the headings 'What is Lorem Ipsum?', 'Where does it come from?', and 'Why do we use it?' should be visible.
